description:
Ena Setsuna is a 16-year-old illustrator who goes under the pen name Puriketsu. He was in charge of illustrating http://anidb.net/ch90513 [Itsuki]`s novel until Itsuki decided to stop because he thought his series is not worthy enough for Setsuna`s art and asked him to wait until he is worthy enough. He dresses in Harajuku fashion.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ena Setsuna
